OK so I checked into this room in late July and I‚Äôve been staying here since August the room is very clean very quiet comfortable and firemen what I like about the room the most as it was right next to AutoZone so many things wrong with my car I can go right next-door it‚Äôs shopping with in the area like KFC Starbucks is around the corner and Disneyland is not too far away may be like 20 minutes but after all the room is perfect the guy at the front desk is really nice his name is Mike the housekeepers are very sweet and one thing that I do like about it is that the housekeepers are very very clean when it come  To doing the rooms and I love cleanest and the shower is great one for you body and one part for your head it feels great. And if you‚Äôre looking for a room where you

The smoke alarm battery decided to go bad at 5:00 am.  I called the front desk.  They came to put another battery in and it was another bad battery.  They finally just took it out after i requested it so I could get some rest.  Never got back to sleep.  Complained to the front desk upon check out and the front desk told me there was nothing they could do to compensate me.  I will never go back and would not suggest this hotel to anyone ever.

I would NEVER stay here again. We checked in late in the night, after 9pm. The front desk guy was nice and friendly. Did the normal check in as most hotels do. We went to our room, dropped off our stuff and took off for an already scheduled event. That is where we made our mistake. Upon entering the room, there was an odd smell but we just opened the window, in hopes that would fix, it and left. We also noticed stains on the comforters but figured we just won't use them. We did not get back to the hotel until after 230AM. Getting back into our room, we noticed things weren't up to par. The smell was of urine and leaving the window open did nothing to get rid of it. We went in to use the bathroom and noticed the floor had hairs all over it. After some of my party, laid down due
Manager Response: Dear Guest , we have clearly investigated all the issues you mentioned and there was nothing as you mentioned  ,even the pictures you posted does not show anything which you are complaining about  . when we offered you the other room you had issues with that too , we rented both the rooms and none of the guests reported anything which you mentioned , we have already refunded for the 2nd night despite its a non refundable reservation , we are known for our cleanliness , we take our business seriously and that's why we are busy all the time and have top rated reviews , we apologies for the inconvenience you had at our property

Summary: Traveling for business or just need a place to rest and freshen up? This place is AMAZING! So Clean, staff is so friendly, honest to God one of the best. Lobby has so much brochures that offer extensive information of what to do while in the area. Quiet, Safe, did I say CLEAN?!?! a MUST STAY! Better that other hotels hand down.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy ,  Thank you for taking time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, we hope to see you again! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary: I do not know what the expectations of the people who have stayed at this property and left great reviews are, but this property did not meet my expectations based on the reviews I read.  It was unclean, and by unclean I mean that you cannot trust that housekeeping changes the sheets between guests and there was a urine stain on the bathroom floor in one of our rooms.  It is also in a rough neighborhood full of dive bars.  Here was my experience: Check-in:      Lobby was okay, but I was immediately taken aback by the fact that the front desk staff was sitting behind a glass wall and you have to push your ID and credit card through a pass through like at a drive up bank teller window.  This does not immediately tell a visitor that this is a friendly and guest oriented

We stayed at this motel for one night during a trip to Orange County. Although Disneyland was not in our plans it is located less than 3 miles from Disney and was competitively priced for the area. It is a one level motel with easy access to the room. It has been completely renovated so the rooms are very clean and modern. It was quite a comfortable stay. Our room had hardwood floors, a fridge, a microwave, and a desk. There was not much nearby as far as restaurants to walk to but there were many choices nearby using our car. Overall, we were satisfied with our stay and would stay there again if our travels included a stay in that area.

Very beautiful clean rooms, love the custom shower!This hotel is completely remodeled.  Coffee,fridge,WiFi,etc everything you need. I give them 5 stars. Great customer service and 24hr surveillance on the premises. I felt like I was on a mini getaway without going to far from home. Will definitely be returning very soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review! Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a pleasant stay and we appreciate your review. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, we hope to see you again! Thank you again for your time and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: President of my Own Smog Inspection & Vehicle Registration Company. ( 6 Locations )
Summary: Newly Remodeled, Very Well Done. The Woman who Checked me in was Extremely Helpful & Polite. I own my Own business & I know, the Most Important Factor to Run Any Successfull Business , Employees. She Actually Looked as if She Enjoyed her Position. It‚Äôs just Refreshing to see . The Amenities in the Room , Pretty Good. Mattress & Pillows , Sheets Very Nice. Only 2 Suggestions. Upgrade the Towels. And more Lights in the Rooms . Under the Tv, you could even put 1 Rope Light.  In Summary. I will Definitely Stay here again. Location is Smack in the middle of Anaheim, so everything you could want, is Close by. Thanks. Richard
Manager Response: Thank you for making Parkside Inn your choice of stay. We like to think of our place as an affordable place for families hoping to get the best value during their vacation. We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: Excellent stay !!! We stayed for 3 days and from the minute we arrived you could tell you were at the best motel we ever stayed.All the staff were always smiling and really seemed like they enjoyed their jobs and were constantly checking in to make sure all was well.Our room was very clean with a modern bathroom  ,rain shower was awesome .This is the second  time we have stayed at parkside inn  and we will be back.also they have installed new Cable line today so it has now got ESPN, HBO now , no reason to complain about , another reason to make it my favorite in Anaheim
Room tip: the rooms are modern , no doubts but they have a refundable deposit of $100 at check in
Manager Response: Thank you for making Parkside Inn your choice of stay. We like to think of our place as an affordable place for families hoping to get the best value during their vacation. We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: Short version: Looks great, but is short on amenities and lacks some functional things needed to make the room comfortable to do more than sleep in. The neighborhood seems sketchy at first glance, but, after a couple of days there, we actually felt the neighborhood, while run down some, was reasonably safe.  Longer version: This hotel is clearly older in construction, but has been very tastefully remodeled. Everything shown in the photos is reasonably represented. What looks good looks great. Parking is literally right outside the room and is free. The WiFi was easy to connect to, and was adequate to our needs. We did stream one TV show at one point and it had no issues. Raw space wise, the room is plenty large.  The down sides include: No chair in the room other than the desk
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Dear Guest , We strive to provide a superior guest experience, and I am sorry yours did not meet expectations. Rest assured appropriate measures are being taken to address the problem and prevent future occurrence. We appreciate sharing your concerns and hope you will give us an opportunity to better serve you in the near future

Summary: We loved this motel! There were four of us staying in our room and it was spacious and comfortable for all of us. The room was very clean and the bathroom was beautiful. The only thing I can think that wasn‚Äôt above and beyond is that the walls are a bit thin, and we could hear activity in the rooms around us. It wasn‚Äôt an issue at all, but we did notice it a couple of times.
Manager Response: Dear Chelsea, Thanks for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all. We couldn't ask for a better review. I really hope you guys will come and stay with us every time you come into town. We appreciate sharing your concerns,Rest assured appropriate measures are being taken to address the problem and prevent future occurrence

Summary: The rooms are exactly as in pictures not like most of the places having fake pictures, everything is clean ,the lady who checked us in was great and really take care of us during the entire stay . Everyone should give it a try , I think it‚Äôs sold out every night very busy place  but still quite and safe area, lots of restaurants nearby
Manager Response: Hello yasmene, Thank you for making Parkside Inn your choice of stay. We like to think of our place as an affordable place for families hoping to get the best value during their vacation. We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: We stayed in the king room all the way in the back of the property and it was very recently remodeled... they did a great job! Everything was obviously very clean but on top of that it was so well designed. Everything looked great from the curtains to the faucets I would have picked out all that stuff for my own house... the staff was welcoming and we didn't have any issues at all with the entire experience. If I HAD to pick things to complain about its the mattress was pretty firm and the towels weren't great.. also decent little taco place a few streets up
Manager Response: Hello, , We are glad to know you enjoyed our newly renovated hotel and our modern style rooms. Thank you for telling us about your experience and we hope to see you again on your next visit.We apologize that bed was a bit hard, since it is a brand new bed it tends to be like that in the beginning. We hope the next time you stay with us you will be more comfortable with the bed.. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff.

Summary: Really a great hotel.  Check in was smooth and friendly , Additionally when the parking lot was full we were helped to find a place to park. The rooms were pretty modern and renovated which was nice. The beds were super clean , they have rain showers and the rooms seemed to be fully cleaned everyday. Very impressed with this place.Me and my girlfriend checked into this hotel, and the employee that was working there was super helpful, very nice and he helped us get a room that was really nice! which was awesome! His name was Sid and he made our experience better!
Manager Response: Hello , Thanks for staying with us and for sharing your review with us all. We couldn't ask for a better review. I really hope you guys will come and stay with us every time you come into town..

Summary: Updated and clean interior with a nice glass door.The staff were so nice and helpful. They want to you to have a good stay. I wish all hotel staff was a great as them.  room was just like the pictures and was very clean and nice. The bed/linens/pillows were comfortable and they even have one on those rainfall shower heads. The shower is also large. Disneyland is very close , it was only $7.50 to ride an Uber to Disneyland . Would recommend and would def. stay there again.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: Feels like a spa in here with the rain shower and the modern room. The customer service is very helpful and nice. The best part is that it is only a 6 minute drive to Disneyland! I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are known for the excellent value that we offer in this location, and we appreciate your acknowledgment of this. It sounds as if our property was suitable for your stay in this area, and if you have similar accommodation requirements here again, we hope that you will choose to stay with us again. Thank you for your review.

Summary: I love staying at really nice hotels when we go on vacation.  Parkside Inn popped up when I was searching, and the pictures of the rooms and rain shower is what caught my attention.  I was hesitant at first because it was a motel, and we only like to stay at hotels.  Since we were going to be doing many parks and activities, I liked the price and what I would be saving by trying this place out.   Let me say that this place is a hidden gem!  They have 4-star customer service.  The rooms are immaculate.  They have all the amenities of finer hotels: coffee maker in room, blow dryer, ironing board and iron.  I absolutely loved the rain shower! The parking lot was so clean and tidy.  You have got to try Parkside Inn out.  You won‚Äôt be disappointed!! I definitely will be staying here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback, we are glad our clean rooms and quiet location met your needs; we hope to see you again soon.
